quote: Human beings, as I know better than most, can get used to anything. Over time, even the unthinkable gradually wears a little niche for itself in your mind and becomes just something that happened.
quote_letters: HUMAN BEINGS AS I KNOW BETTER THAN MOST CAN GET USED TO ANYTHING OVER TIME EVEN THE UNTHINKABLE GRADUALLY WEARS A LITTLE NICHE FOR ITSELF IN YOUR MIND AND BECOMES JUST SOMETHING THAT HAPPENED

chat:
themselves - Oneself's plural counterpart.
